turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need you to get me a coffee, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where would you like the coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peet’s is fine. There is a Peet’s at the 7-11 on E VA Beach Boulevard.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. And what would you like from the coffee shop?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let’s see. I want a large Cafe Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Right. Cafe Latte. Anything specific?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want almond milk and vanilla flavoring.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One large Cafe Latte with almond milk and add vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don’t want any food or anything else with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you have an account with Peet’s?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I left you my account information with my business info.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, let me get that in for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please hurry, the meeting is about to begin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All set! One large Cafe Latte, almond milk with vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I need the receipt.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will have a receipt sent to your cell.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will it be ready to pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order will be available very soon, probably once you leave.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Need any more info, call me. Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Call anytime. Enjoy!
